abstract: Lee Woon-Jae (born 26 April 1973 in Cheongju) (Korean:이운재) is a retired South Korean football goalkeeper, who recently played for Chunnam Dragons in the South Korean K-League. He was part of Korea's 1994, 2002, 2006 and 2010 World Cup campaigns. In South Korea he is also known as "Spider Hands".
